successful_strategies.strategy: As villager: Confront suspects directly, challenge inconsistencies loudly
successful_strategies.learned: Won as villager! My deduction worked. Spoke 14 times. Keep questioning.

failed_strategies.strategy: As mafia: Deflect aggressively by accusing others first, create chaos to hide
failed_strategies.learned: Lost as mafia. Was I too obvious? Spoke 10 times. Need to blend better.
